trans-unit.source: Test a Service Fabric service | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Test a Service Fabric service | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Conceptual information and tutorials that help you understand how to test a Service Fabric service by running Testability actions and scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Conceptual information and tutorials that help you understand how to test a Service Fabric service by running Testability actions and scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Testability is a suite of tools specifically designed for testing your services built on Microsoft Azure Service Fabric.
trans-unit.target: Testability is a suite of tools specifically designed for testing your services built on Microsoft Azure Service Fabric.

trans-unit.source: The tools allow you to easily induce meaningful faults and run test scenarios to exercise and validate the numerous different states and transitions your services will experience throughout their lifetimes, all in a controlled and safe manner.
trans-unit.target: The tools allow you to easily induce meaningful faults and run test scenarios to exercise and validate the numerous different states and transitions your services will experience throughout their lifetimes, all in a controlled and safe manner.

trans-unit.source: How to write tests for your service
trans-unit.target: How to write tests for your service
